text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: —— "WE～I" and "Ossu". …… Both a kind of greeting.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: "Ore" and "Watashi" — Both like "I". "Ramen after school"…… used to invite. …… Input complete.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: The problem for me are the sentence endings — "nano", "-ssu", "nanoda". …… Their use is difficult.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
But having a complete grasp 
of Japanese is my top priority. 
—— I will continue my learning.
